dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 2004 8:52 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement]

For your review.
-- 
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] URGENT: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
Date:         Thu, 26 Aug 2004 09:37:02 -0700
From:         Rosenfield, Kevin (SEA) <KRosenfield@prestongates.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <admins@theplanet.com>




I am an attorney for Valve Corporation.  Thank you for your prompt
attention to this matter.  I look forward to your confirmation that the
infringing material has been removed from your systems.

<<KA1RL208T==Planet3 DMCA.doc>>


*Kevin A. Rosenfield*
*PrestonlGateslEllis LLP*

925 Fourth Ave, Suite 2900
Seattle, Washington  98104-1158

Phone   (206) 370-6586 (direct)
Fax     (206) 370-6309 (direct)

email   krosenfield@prestongates.com
dmca.principal_name: Preston Gates and Ellis LLP (for Valve Corporation)
